sections.name: Stirvyn Banyan

link.name: Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs pg. 39
link.alt: Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs pg. 39

sections.html: This creature did not include a description.

link.name: Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs pg. 39
link.alt: Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs pg. 39

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Human
traits.text: A creature with this trait is a member of the human ancestry. Humans are a diverse array of people known for their adaptability. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by humans.

traits.name: Humanoid
traits.text: Humanoid creatures reason and act much like humans. They typically stand upright and have two arms and two legs.

link.name: Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs pg. 39
link.alt: Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs pg. 39

gear.name: Sheriff Banyan's map of the sea caves

automatic_abilities.name: Duck Away
automatic_abilities.trigger: Stirvyn is targeted with an attack and is adjacent to an ally
automatic_abilities.effect: Stirvyn and the ally swap places, and the ally becomes the target of the attack.

traits.name: Concentrate
traits.text: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.

traits.name: Move
traits.text: An action with this trait involves moving from one space to another.

traits.name: Magical
traits.text:
Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. A magical item radiates a magic aura infused with its dominant school of magic.  
  
 Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

traits.name: Two-Hand
traits.text: This weapon can be wielded with two hands. Doing so changes its weapon damage die to the indicated value. This change applies to all the weapon's damage dice, such as those from _striking_ runes.

ability.name: Bloodline Magic
ability.text: When Stirvyn casts a bloodline spell, a surge of ancestral memories grants either him or a target of the spell a +1 status bonus to skill checks for 1 round.

ability.name: Dangerous Sorcery
ability.text: When Stirvyn Casts a Spell from a spell slot, if the spell deals damage and doesn't have a duration, he gains a status bonus to that spell's damage equal to the spell's level.

ability.name: Steady Spellcasting
ability.text: If a reaction would disrupt Stirvyn's spellcasting action, he attempts a DC 15 flat check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.
